body_html: Our issue turned out to be an issue with power supply as well. Sadly, the workstations are provided by Lenovo (P910), so there are no other compatible PSUs on the market. Our GPUs were Quardo P6000. We are now trying to solve the issue by experimenting with limiting the GPU power consumption in Linux by command: nvidia-smi --power-limit=150
